name: TweetReader
0:
”Alexa, ask Tweet Reader to read tweets of Barack Obama”
”Alexa, ask Tweet Reader what is Donald Trump tweeting today”
”Alexa, open Tweet Reader and give me recent tweets by NFL”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tweet reader
des:
An unofficial Twitter skill to read the latest tweet of your famous celebrity or personality or anyone with a twitter profile. You can ask Tweet Reader to read the latest tweet of anyone who has a public profile on Twitter.

Invoke skill by asking Alexa, ask Tweet Reader to read tweets of your favorite person like
Alexa, ask Tweet Reader to read tweets of Jimmy Fallon
or
Alexa, ask Tweet Reader for the latest tweet by Ariana Grande
or
Alexa, open Tweet Reader and give me the latest tweet by Justin Bieber

Work in-progress: Read multiple tweets by a user, read tweets on latest twitter trends, read tweets by hash tag

Please provide your feedback. Enjoy !
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
